subject: Super Bowl
Power Outages and Blackouts
Stadiums and Arenas
Football
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the power failure at the Superdome was not caused by the halftime show and that it would it not affect New Orleans’s ability to host future Super Bowls.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the power failure at the Superdome was not caused by the halftime show and that it would it not affect New Orleans’s ability to host future Super Bowls.
